snippet: Paula Deen, the superstar Southern chef whose extravagant use of butter has inspired rants from fellow food celebrities, is going to be a busy woman over the next two years.
abstract: Ballantine Books will release two new cookbooks and three e-books by celebrity chef Paula Deen.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

lead_paragraph: Paula Deen, the superstar Southern chef whose extravagant use of butter has inspired rants from fellow food celebrities, is going to be a busy woman over the next two years.
